name: parhelion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a bright spot that appears in the sky on either side of the sun, caused by the refraction (= bending) of light through ice crystals in high cloud: Parhelia usually appear as two bright spots either side of the sun at about 22°. Look at this incredible image of a parhelion. Synonym
sundog
